page.title: 01ICE-SKATING
page.content: Once every term, the school plans a treat for the pupils of the school. they take us to a local ice skating rink at Peterbourogh. it costs approximately Â£2.50 to go on the bus and for addmittion into the rink.At the rink they sell skating boots and special clothing. you can also get drink and a meal. there are also machines there which sell sweets and crisps. The rink is quite big and quite crowded,but as the night goes on the rink soon starts to empty. At about 8.30 they put a disco on,they have flashing lights and some good music. Later on in the night people get hungry and go in the cafe to get some chips or a bun. After a fun packed 2 hours the bus drivers and the teachers are ready to leave.We get on the bus and start the 45 miles journey home.We arrive home at 11.30.
